name: westcoast-education
description: A modern, responsive education platform for managing and booking courses, tailored for WestCoast Education.

scriptsComments.dev:http: Start a local server to serve the static files in the public folder. Previously Live Server was used for this purpose, but it was replaced with http-server since live server has a bug where the pages are updated if you call to the json-server
scriptsComments.dev:styles: Compile Tailwind CSS to CSS and using PostCSS
scriptsComments.dev:server: Start JSON Server to serve the endpoints
scriptsComments.dev:ts: Compile TypeScript to JavaScript and watch for changes
scriptsComments.dev: Run all development scripts in parallel
